prep.title: Eat Breakfast
prep.body: Don't skip it! Grab any meds from the Health Center before you leave. Bring your inhaler/epi-pen if you need one.

prep.title: Meet in Thomson Gym
prep.body: Don't be late‚Äîwe roll out together.

prep.title: Browne Center Activities
prep.body: Outdoor team games, problem-solving, and adventure challenges (some on the ground, some climbing!). All "challenge by choice," so you set your level. Dress for the weather + check the attached "What to Wear" list.

prep.title: Back on Campus
prep.body: Your activities (dance, music, athletics) + dinner on your own.

prep.title: Ice Cream Social @ Phelps Stadium üç¶
prep.body: Chill, hang out, celebrate the day.

lower.title: Orientation Day
lower.body: Start Time: 8:15 AM. Meeting Location: The library lawn, specifically near the memorial.

lower.title: Team-building Workshops
lower.body: Led by the dynamic team from Thrive.

lower.title: Downtown Exeter Scavenger Hunt
lower.body: Using the Goosechase app (one group member will need to download the app), where you'll explore local shops and sample various food items.

upper.title: Breakfast
upper.body: Breakfast will be open in either New Dining Hall and Elm Street. Grab something before heading over to Goel.

upper.title: Meet at Goel
upper.body: Get briefed on the day and receive supplies and info.

upper.title: Explore Portsmouth
upper.body: Explore Portsmouth for 1.5-2 hours (we will provide a map). Grab yourself a snack or a drink, spend time with people in a new place and have some fun.

upper.title: Walk to Lunch
upper.body: Walk over to Lunch at Four Tree Island.

upper.title: Lunch
upper.body: Lunch from Bennett's Sandwich Shop. We will have this hour to eat, unwind, play games, etc.

upper.title: Load Buses & Head Back
upper.body: Load buses at Prescott Park and head back to PEA.

upper.title: Reflection and Debrief
upper.body: Reflection and debrief at Goel to end the day!

senior.title: Breakfast
senior.body: Both dining halls are open for breakfast.

senior.title: Arrive to the Field House
senior.body: Meeting location for the day's activities.

senior.title: Group Activities with Bald Mountain Meadow
senior.body: We will share group assignments on Wednesday.

senior.title: Lunch in the Wrestling Room
senior.body: Lunch in the Wrestling Room of the Field House.

senior.title: Field Day
senior.body: We will share team assignments on Wednesday.

senior.title: Inaugural Senior Class Dinner
senior.body: Inaugural Senior Class Dinner in the Wrestling Room of the Field House.
